01/ About Me

This is where i talk about me, but i am a bit keyword shy today to i'll just placehold this section with some jibber

I am a geek who spend my time traveling through East Africa. I splimt most of my time between Mombasa, Kenya and Arusha, Tanzania which is where I am basically based

I am a self taught computer programmer and an overall nice guy, but i am not a very 'politically correct' kind of guy,so i will always tell you as it is even if you won't like it

I love making web based software applications and I am the founder of WatabeLabs(link), a web dev shop in Arusha
